
{{alias}}( x )
    Tests if a numeric value is finite.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: double
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether the value is finite.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( 5.0 )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( -2.0e64 )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( Number.NEGATIVE_INFINITY )
    false

    See Also
    --------
